intro: Defend your castle across 100 thrilling levels! Command unique warriors, use powerful abilities, and stop the orcs.
description:
Command your warriors and stop the orcs and villains from raiding your stronghold. With 100 action-packed levels, 11 unique defensive forces, 3 powerful abilities, and an engaging power-up system, your castle stands ready for the ultimate battle!

Key Features:

Dynamic Battle Mechanics: Engage in strategic, turn-based combat with immersive gameplay.
11 Unique Defenders: Command a variety of fictional warriors, monsters, and magical units.
Castle Customization: Decorate your fortress with flags, elements, 2 castle skins, and 3 unique weapons.
100 Exciting Levels: Progress through a full campaign of increasingly challenging stages.
Achievements & Rewards: Unlock achievements and spin the fortune wheel for powerful bonuses.
Avatar Personalization: Customize your player name and avatar for a unique experience.
Powerful Abilities: Equip 3 distinct abilities per hero and master 4 special powers for combat dominance.
